es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica6.server

Class ProxyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ucm.fdi.tp.basecode.bgame.control.Controller
      • es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica6.server.ProxyController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable<GameObserver>, SocketEndpoint

    public class ProxyController
extends Controller
implements Observable<GameObserver>, SocketEndpoint
    A class to represent a Controller from the client side. It works as an endpoint to send and receive data with the server.

    Clase que representa un Controller desde el lado del cliente. Funciona como un endpoint para enviar y recibir datos con el servidor.

    Author:
    Raul Murillo and Antonio Valdivia.

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ProxyController.ClientMessage
      A generic, abstract message to send to the server.

      A message to notify a game move.
      static class  ProxyController.RestartMessage
      A message to restart the game.
      static class  ProxyController.StopMessage
      A message to stop the game.

      • ProxyController

        public ProxyController()
        Creates a Client/Controller with name localhost, in port 2020, timelimit 2000 and no algorithm for teh AI Player.

        Crea un Cliente/Controlador con nombre localhost, en el puerto 2020, tiempo limite de 2000 y sin agoritmo de AI.

      • ProxyController

        public ProxyController(java.lang.String hostname,
                       int port,
                       int timeout,
                       AIAlgorithm aiPlayerAlg)
        Creates a Client/Controller with the specified data.

        Crea un Cliente/Controlador con los datos especificados.

        Parameters:
        hostname - Name of the client.

        Nombre del cliente.

        port - Port on which connect.

        Puerto al que conectarse.

        timeout - Time limit for connection awaiting.

        Tiempo limite de espera de conexion.

        aiPlayerAlg - Algorithm for the AI Player.

        Algoritmo para el jugador inteligente.

    • Method Detail

      • startConnection

        public void startConnection(java.net.Socket socket,
                            int timeout)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: SocketEndpoint
        Call this to start listening on the socket. Any incoming data will result in a call to dataReceived.

        Inicia la escucha sobre el socket. Cualquier dato entrante desencadenara una llamada a dataReceived.

        Specified by:
        startConnection in interface SocketEndpoint
        Parameters:
        socket - The socket on which they want to listen.

        El socket sobre el que se quiere escuchar.

        timeout - Time limit for awaiting connection.

        Plazo para la espera de conexion.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
